FuncDef: The reset ospfv3 frr command resets OSPFv3 IP FRR. The reset ospfv3 frr command resets OSPFv3 IP FRR. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the ID of an OSPFv3 process.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

Resets FRR for all OSPFv3 processes running on router.
-

ExtraInfo: This command is a maintenance command. It can be used to forcibly reset FRR without deleting the FRR configuration.
